name: Quantum Trap
description:
This is a Prototype for the "IF Quantum Game Jam 2021".

Quantum Trap is a first person puzzle game where you have to switch between classical mechanics and quantum mechanics to solve puzzles.

Credits: 

Francesco Generali (Game Designer, Programmer)

Luca Barralati - Ashwalker (Main Programmer)

Tommaso Mechini (Concept Artist)
